SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Drawdown calculations based on EIA EV Price projections
Assumptions: Using total dataset, we summarize the production (ignoring replacement) and weighted prices for 100- and 200-mile Evs along with PHEV-10 and PHEV-40. Using the calculator at bottom of this sheet, the estimated Learning Rate for three scenarios is estimated: Reference, Low Oil Price and Low Oil Price Gas Resource and Technology.

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Drawdown Calculations based on Battery Learning Rate Estimates of Nykvist, B., & Nilsson, M. (2015). Rapidly falling costs of battery packs for electric vehicles. Nature Climate Change, 5(4), 329â€“332. http://doi.org/10.1038/nclimate2564
Assumptions: Range provided was 6 to 9% for battery pack. Breaking out cost of battery and assuming no learning rate for remaining car components, we use the calculator at bottom of this sheet to estimate the learning rate for entire car.
